content: "(500) Days of Summer" is a romantic comedy-drama movie released in 2009. The story follows the nonlinear narrative of Tom Hansen (played by Joseph Gordon-Levitt), a greeting-card writer, and his relationship with Summer Finn (played by Zooey Deschanel), his co-worker. The film depicts the highs and lows of their relationship as it progresses through its different stages over the course of 500 days. The movie explores themes such as love, expectations, and the realities of relationships. "(500) Days of Summer" received critical acclaim for its non-linear narrative, performances, and direction.
